entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
